name: Pharmacy Simulator
description:
Sometimes you you want to help people, buy simply don't know how. There is only one solution - step into the Unknown and find out. People will die, homes will burn. Everything for the greater good - your own good.

It's an entry for Slavic Game Jam 2017

Created by:

Piotr Swiatowski
Marcin "Szagi" Iwanowski
Pawel Legowski
Jurek Netzel
Jacek "Asterix" Kozieja
Lukasz Junczyk

from Orbital Knight studio
